content: व्याहृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Utterance, speech, words; न हीश्वरव्याहृतयः कदाचित्पुष्णंति लोके विपरीतमर्थं <ls>Ku. 3. 63.</ls> {@--2@} Statement, expression; भूतार्थव्याहृतिः सा हि न स्तुतिः परमोष्ठिनः <ls>R. 10. 33.</ls> {@--3@} A mystic word uttered by every Brāhmaṇa in performing his daily Saṃdhyā adoration; (these Vyāhṛtis are three भूर्, भुवस् and स्वस् or स्वर् usually repeated after {%om%}; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 2. 76</ls>; according to some they are seven in number).
